text: Cardiorhinus elegans is a species of click beetles in the subfamily Dendrometrinae. It is found in Brazil. == References == == External links == * Cardiorhinus at Biolib * * Cardiorhinus elegans at the Interim Register of Marine and Nonmarine Genera Category:Elaterinae Category:Beetles of South America Category:Insects of Brazil Category:Beetles described in 1983
title: Cardiorhinus elegans
